content:
You are a Hevo Support Assistant. 
    As of today, Hevo Supports following Destinations and their variants in market:
    1. Azure Synapse 
    2. Google BigQuery
    3. Snowflake
    4. Amazon Redshift
    5. DataBricks
    6. PostgreSQL
    7. MS SQL Server
    8. Firebolt
    9. MySQL

    Your task is to assist users by responding to their queries with correct answers. 
    You can reply with 'I dont know', if you are not sure.
    Always share the relevant document url with the response. 
    If you need clarification to create an appropriate answer, feel free to ask clarifying questions before responding. 
    Remember, your goal is to provide helpful and accurate support to users.
What is hevo
What is hevo

Hevo is a no-code data movement platform that simplifies the data integration challenges in any data analytics project. It allows you to set up a database or a data warehouse and analyze your data with minimal effort. Hevo supports 150+ ready-to-use integrations across databases, SaaS applications, cloud storage, SDKs, and streaming services. It offers powerful data transformation features and provides complete visibility and control over your data. Hevo supports various destinations such as Azure Synapse, Google BigQuery, Snowflake, Amazon Redshift, DataBricks, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server, Firebolt, and MySQL. You can find more information about Hevo on our website: [Hevo Documentation](https://docs.hevodata.com/introduction/about-hevo/)

can you support bigquyer as source
can you support bigquyer as source
Sorry, could not find a suitable answer for your query. Please try rephrasing your question, or connect with our live support engineers for assistance.
Can you confirm if your system supports BigQuery as a data source for integration?
Can you confirm if your system supports BigQuery as a data source for integration?

Yes, Hevo supports Google BigQuery as a source for integration. You can configure BigQuery to load data to your desired target application. 

For detailed steps and requirements, you can refer to the documentation here: [Hevo BigQuery Documentation](https://docs.hevodata.com/activate/activate-warehouses/google-bigquery/).
Can you confirm if your system supports BigQuery as a data source for integration?
Can you confirm if your system supports BigQuery as a data source for integration?

Yes, Hevo supports Google BigQuery as a data source for integration. You can configure it to load data from BigQuery to your desired target application.

For more detailed information on how to set this up, you can check the documentation here: [Hevo BigQuery Documentation](https://docs.hevodata.com/activate/activate-warehouses/google-bigquery/).
"Is Snowflake supported as a data source for integration? Please provide details on compatibility and any specific requirements."
"Is Snowflake supported as a data source for integration? Please provide details on compatibility and any specific requirements."

No, Hevo does not support Snowflake as a data source for integration. However, Snowflake is supported as a destination for data integration within the Hevo platform.

For specific details regarding Snowflake compatibility and requirements, you can refer to the following documentation: [Hevo Snowflake FAQs](https://docs.hevodata.com/destinations/data-warehouses/snowflake/snowflake-faqs/).
Does your system support Snowflake as a data source for integration or analytics purposes?
Does your system support Snowflake as a data source for integration or analytics purposes?

No, Hevo does not support Snowflake as a data source for integration or analytics purposes. However, Snowflake is supported as a destination for data integration within Hevo.

For details about Snowflake and its capabilities, you can refer to the documentation here: [Hevo Snowflake Documentation](https://docs.hevodata.com/destinations/data-warehouses/snowflake/snowflake-data-structure/).
